original_text: Provide three men from each tribe, and I will send them out that they may set out and go up and down the land. They shall write a description of it with a view to their inheritances, and then come to me.
korean_text: 너희는 각 지파에 세 사람씩 선정하라 내가 그들을 보내리니 그들은 일어나서 그 땅에 두루 다니며 그들의 기업에 따라 그 땅을 그려 가지고 내게로 돌아올 것이라

sentences.original_text: Provide three men from each tribe,
and I will send them out
that they may set out and go up and down the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 땅을 두루 다니게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: They shall write a description of it
with a view to their inheritances,
